summary: Ajax is a famous Dutch football club from Amsterdam. They are the most successful team in the Netherlands, winning 36 league titles and many cups. Founded in 1900, they have played in the top league since 1956. Ajax is known for their youth academy and has won many international trophies, including the European Cup in 1972 and the Champions League in 1995. They play their home games at the Johan Cruyff Arena.
title: AFC Ajax
